original: @438b / /rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @438b / /rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: mah'a k'a shya pa s'u tra /
analyzed: mah'a k'a shya pa s'u tra /
translated: Mahākāśyapa-sūtra

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'od srung chen po'i mdo /
analyzed: 'od srung chen po'i mdo /
translated: The Sūtra of Mahākāśyapa

original: 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble Three Jewels with devotion!

original: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
translated: Thus have I heard at one time:

original: rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal ka landa ka'i gnas na bzhugs so //
analyzed: rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal ka landa ka'i gnas na bzhugs so //
translated: He was dwelling in the Kalandaka Grove in the Veṇuvana near Rājagṛha.

original: de'i tshe de'i dus na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po pi bya la'i phug na bzhugs te /
analyzed: de'i tshe de'i dus na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po pi bya la'i phug na bzhugs te /
translated: At that time, the venerable Mahākāśyapa was dwelling in the Pippalāyāna Cave,

original: nad dam pos gzir zhing sdug bsngal bar gyur to //
analyzed: nad dam pos gzir zhing sdug bsngal bar gyur to //
translated: afflicted and suffering from a serious illness.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das srod la'i dus su so sor thams cad rtog cing bzhugs so //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das srod la'i dus su so sor thams cad rtog cing bzhugs so //
translated: Then, in the evening, the Blessed One was sitting contemplating each and every thing.

original: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po ga la ba der gshegs shing nye bar gshegs te gdan bshams pa la bzhugs te /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po ga la ba der gshegs shing nye bar gshegs te gdan bshams pa la bzhugs te /
translated: He went to where the venerable Mahākāśyapa was, approached him, sat on the prepared seat,

original: bzhugs nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: bzhugs nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: and having sat down, the Blessed One said this to the venerable Mahākāśyapa:

original: 'od srung / khyod ji ltar bza' ba 'dod dam /
analyzed: 'od srung / khyod ji ltar bza' ba 'dod dam /
translated: Kāśyapa, how do you eat?

original: ji ltar sdug bsngal myong /
analyzed: ji ltar sdug bsngal myong /
translated: How do you experience suffering?

original: ji @439a *// ltar zhi bar 'gyur /
analyzed: ji @439a *// ltar zhi bar 'gyur /
translated: How do you become peaceful?

original: zhi bar byed pa'i thabs kyis mi zhi ba ma yin no //
analyzed: zhi bar byed pa'i thabs kyis mi zhi ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not that you are not peaceful by means of the method of pacification.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos gsol pa /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos gsol pa /
translated: Then the venerable Mahākāśyapa said,

original: btsun pa / bdag ni bza' ba dang / btung ba la mi sred par gyur /
analyzed: btsun pa / bdag ni bza' ba dang / btung ba la mi sred par gyur /
translated: “Venerable, I have no craving for food and drink.

original: bdag nad dam pos gzir bar gyur te /
analyzed: bdag nad dam pos gzir bar gyur te /
translated: I am afflicted by a severe illness.

original: zhi ba'am / mi zhi bar 'gyur /
analyzed: zhi ba'am / mi zhi bar 'gyur /
translated: Please make me peaceful or not peaceful.

original: zhi bar byed pa'i thabs mdzad du gsol /
analyzed: zhi bar byed pa'i thabs mdzad du gsol /
translated: Please perform the method of pacification.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po 'di ngas legs par bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po 'di ngas legs par bshad par bya'o //
translated: I will explain well these seven factors of awakening.

original: de mang du bsgoms par byas pa na /
analyzed: de mang du bsgoms par byas pa na /
translated: When one cultivates them extensively,

original: mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub pa dang / mya ngan las 'das par gyur to //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub pa dang / mya ngan las 'das par gyur to //
translated: one attains the superknowledges, awakening, and nirvāṇa.

original: bdun po gang zhe na /
analyzed: bdun po gang zhe na /
translated: What are the seven?

original: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag 'di /
analyzed: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag 'di /
translated: The factor of complete awakening that is mindfulness,

original: 'od srung / ngas yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag tu bshad do //
analyzed: 'od srung / ngas yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag tu bshad do //
translated: Kāśyapa, I explain as a factor of true awakening.

original: de mang du bsgoms par byas pa na /
analyzed: de mang du bsgoms par byas pa na /
translated: When he had meditated on it a lot,

original: mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub pa dang / mya ngan las 'das par gyur to //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub pa dang / mya ngan las 'das par gyur to //
translated: he attained the superknowledges, awakening, and Nirvaṇa.

original: yang 'od srung /
analyzed: yang 'od srung /
translated: “Again, Kāśyapa,

original: ngas chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag tu bshad do //
analyzed: ngas chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag tu bshad do //
translated: I have explained the factor of complete awakening that is the investigation of phenomena.

original: de mang du bsgoms par byas pa na /
analyzed: de mang du bsgoms par byas pa na /
translated: When he had meditated on it a lot,

original: mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub pa dang / mya ngan las 'das par gyur to //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub pa dang / mya ngan las 'das par gyur to //
translated: he attained the superknowledges, awakening, and Nirvaṇa.

original: yang 'od srung /
analyzed: yang 'od srung /
translated: “Again, Kāśyapa,

original: ngas brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag tu bshad do //
analyzed: ngas brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag tu bshad do //
translated: I have explained the factor of complete awakening that is effort.

original: de mang du bsgoms par byas pa na /
analyzed: de mang du bsgoms par byas pa na /
translated: When he had meditated on it a lot,

original: mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub pa dang / mya ngan las 'das par gyur to //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub pa dang / mya ngan las 'das par gyur to //
translated: he attained the superknowledges, awakening, and Nirvaṇa.

original: yang 'od srung /
analyzed: yang 'od srung /
translated: “Again, Kāśyapa,

original: ngas dga' @439b ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag tu bshad do //
analyzed: ngas dga' @439b ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag tu bshad do //
translated: I have explained the factor of complete awakening that is joy.

original: de mang du bsgoms par byas pa na /
analyzed: de mang du bsgoms par byas pa na /
translated: When he had meditated on it a lot,

original: mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub pa dang / mya ngan las 'das par gyur to //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub pa dang / mya ngan las 'das par gyur to //
translated: he attained the superknowledges, awakening, and Nirvaṇa.

original: yang 'od srung; ngas shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag tu bshad do //
analyzed: yang 'od srung; ngas shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag tu bshad do //
translated: Kāśyapa, I have explained the branch of awakening of pliancy.

original: de mang du bsgoms par byas pa na /
analyzed: de mang du bsgoms par byas pa na /
translated: When one cultivates it a lot,

original: mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub pa dang / mya ngan las 'das par gyur to //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub pa dang / mya ngan las 'das par gyur to //
translated: one attains the superknowledges, awakening, and nirvāṇa.

original: yang 'od srung /
analyzed: yang 'od srung /
translated: Kāśyapa,

original: ngas ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag tu bshad do //
analyzed: ngas ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag tu bshad do //
translated: I have explained the branch of awakening of meditative stabilization.

original: de mang du bsgoms par byas pa na /
analyzed: de mang du bsgoms par byas pa na /
translated: When one cultivates it a lot,

original: mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub pa dang; mya ngan las 'das par gyur to //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub pa dang; mya ngan las 'das par gyur to //
translated: one attains the superknowledges, awakening, and nirvāṇa.

original: yang 'od srung /
analyzed: yang 'od srung /
translated: Kāśyapa,

original: ngas btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag tu bshad do //
analyzed: ngas btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag tu bshad do //
translated: I have explained the branch of awakening of equanimity.

original: de mang du bsgoms par byas pa na /
analyzed: de mang du bsgoms par byas pa na /
translated: When one cultivates it a lot,

original: mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub pa dang / mya ngan las 'das par gyur to //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub pa dang / mya ngan las 'das par gyur to //
translated: one attains the superknowledges, awakening, and nirvāṇa.

original: 'od srung / 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun te ngas bshad do //
analyzed: 'od srung / 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun te ngas bshad do //
translated: Kāśyapa, these are the seven branches of awakening that I have explained.

original: de mang du bsgoms par byas pa na /
analyzed: de mang du bsgoms par byas pa na /
translated: When one cultivates them a lot,

original: mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub pa dang / mya ngan las 'das par gyur to //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub pa dang / mya ngan las 'das par gyur to //
translated: He attained the supernormal powers, enlightenment, and nirvana.

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag la bslab par bya'o //
translated: The Blessed One said, “The Tathāgata has taught the factors of enlightenment. You should train in them.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
translated: When the Blessed One had said this, the venerable Mahākāśyapa praised the Blessed One’s words.

original: de ma thag tu nad zhi bar @440a *//🔽gyur nas / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po langs so //
analyzed: de ma thag tu nad zhi bar @440a *// gyur nas / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po langs so //
translated: Immediately his illness was cured,🔽and the venerable Mahākāśyapa got up.

original: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po'i nang zhi bar gyur to //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po'i nang zhi bar gyur to //
translated: The venerable Mahākāśyapa’s illness was cured.

original: gnas brtan 'od srung chen po'i mdo rdzogs so;; ;;pandi ta chen po a'a nanta shr'i'i zhal snga nas /
analyzed: gnas brtan 'od srung chen po'i mdo rdzogs so;; ;;pandi ta chen po a'a nanta shr'i'i zhal snga nas /
translated: The Sūtra of the Elder Mahākāśyapa is complete.

original: mang du thos pa'i lo tstsha ba sh'akya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa; gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
analyzed: mang du thos pa'i lo tstsha ba sh'akya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa; gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
translated: The translator who has heard much, the Śākya bhikṣu Nyima Gyaltsen Pal Zangpo, translated, revised, and finalized it at the great temple of glorious Tharpa Ling, the seat of the bilinguals.

original: sa'i steng du nyi ma dang / zla ba ltar gyur cig /
analyzed: sa'i steng du nyi ma dang / zla ba ltar gyur cig /
translated: May it become like the sun and moon on the face of the earth.
